Class Bumper

java.lang.Object
  CircleObject
      Bumper

public class Bumper
extends CircleObject

This class extends the CircleObject class as well. It bounces any pinball to the angle they strike the bumper with.

Version:
(0.4)
Author:
(UP826133)
